reviewText:
Filming the catching of wild hogs has to be a tricky business, and these folks seem to always have an unobtrusive camera in position to capture the excitement of the chase.  The girls are sexy and the guys tough as nails.  Only the hogs are, in the "end", the losers.

Viewing a show of this type is of course, a matter of taste......but.......there is still enough red-neck in a lot of us, to enjoy it.

great show - I'm aware it's somewhat basic reality T.V.
But, it has a great niche I never even really thought of before.
And, the characters are neat.
Texans will save the world from limp-wristed liberals.
Wish we could buy all the seasons on DVD.
My mother loves the show and wishes DVD's were available for all the seasons not just season one for purchase
I really enjoy this program. I especially enjoy listing to the old man (Jerry Campbell) carry on  with his comical comments.

Need to ask question about product!!! Need sellers contact. Please leave away to contact. Want to get this as a gift but it doesnt say how many episodes if its the complete 9 of the season 1...

I do not want to buy and it say it is actually the hrs it says and it not be since it.doesn't list episodes.
